Permalink Create a link to this page Copy and paste this link tag into your Web page or blog: The pros and cons of fast food tenancy.(Focus on Commercial Sales&Leasing) In the city that never sleeps, eating can be just one more entry on the list of things to do. When the Midtown lunch hour hits, fast food establishments are flooded by hoards of hungry business people with little time to eat much less wait for food preparation. Therefore, the demand for fast dependable cheap food becomes a necessity. In a city of endless eating choices, people take comfort in the familiar. And fast food's claim to fame is consistency. When was the last time you went to McDonald's and they didn't have a Big Mac on the menu board? As a consultant specializing in fast food leases, I am often asked to define the term "fast food."
